title: Miracles lately vvrought by the intercession of the glorious Virgin Marie, at Mont-aigu, nere vnto Sich√© in Brabant Gathered out of the publik instruments, and informations taken thereof. By authoritie of the Lord Archbishop of Maclin. Translated out of the French copie into English by M. Robert Chambers priest, and confessor of the English religious dames in the citie of Bruxelles.
author: Numan, Philippe, d. 1617.
